Title: Origin: Spirits of the Past
Writer: Umanosuke Iida (original story), Nana Shiina (screenplay), Naoko Kakimoto (screenplay), John Burgmeier (adr script writer)

Plot: It is 300 years into the future. Earth's environment had been devastated by mankind's own foolish plans and humankind is beleaguered by the sentient forests which they have awoken. The ...
